member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.BaseComponent
member.summary: This is a base-component class. It provides common functions of FrameComponent and ServiceComponent.
member.remarks: This class cannot be registered by ComponentBased applications.

member.name: E:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.BaseComponent.LowMemory
member.summary: Occurs when the system memory is low.

member.name: E:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.BaseComponent.LowBattery
member.summary: Occurs when the system battery is low.

member.name: E:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.BaseComponent.LocaleChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the system language is chagned.

member.name: E:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.BaseComponent.RegionFormatChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the region format is changed.

member.name: E:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.BaseComponent.DeviceOrientationChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the device orientation is changed.

member.name: E:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.BaseComponent.SuspendedStateChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the device orientation is changed.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.BaseComponent.Id
member.summary: A component instance ID. It will be created after OnCreate method is invoked.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.BaseComponent.ComponentId
member.summary: A component ID

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.BaseComponent.Parent
member.summary: Parent object

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.BaseComponent.Finish
member.summary: Finish current component

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.BaseComponent.ContextHandle
member.summary: A Context Handle

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.BaseComponent.OnRestoreContents(Tizen.Applications.Bundle)
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior to restore the previous status.
member.param: Contents. It can be used only in the callback. To use outside, make a copy.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.BaseComponent.OnSaveContent(Tizen.Applications.Bundle)
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior to save current status.
member.param: Contents. It can be used only in the callback. To use outside, make a copy.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.BaseComponent.SendLaunchRequestAsync(Tizen.Applications.AppControl,Tizen.Applications.AppControlReplyCallback)
member.summary: Sends the launch request asynchronously.
member.remarks: To use group mode, you must use this function instead of SendLaunchRequestAsync().
member.param: The callback function to be called when the reply is delivered.
member.returns: A task with the result of the launch request.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of the argument is invalid.
Thrown when fail to set component information to the AppControl.
Thrown when the application to run is not found.
Thrown when the launch request is rejected.

member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.ComponentBasedApplication
member.summary: The class for supporting multi-components based application model.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.ComponentBasedApplication.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Type,System.String})
member.summary: Initializes the ComponentBasedApplicationBase class.
member.param: The component type information. The key should be a class type of FrameComponent or SubComponent subclass. The value should be a component id which is declared in tizen-manifest.xml.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.ComponentBasedApplication.RegisterComponent(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Registers a component.
member.exception: Thrown when component type is already added or not sub-class of FrameComponent or ServiceComponent

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.ComponentBasedApplication.Run(System.String[])
member.summary: Runs the application's main loop.
member.exception: Thrown when component type is already added to the component.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.ComponentBasedApplication.Exit
member.summary: Exits the main loop of the application.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.ComponentBasedApplication.OnInit(System.String[])
member.summary: This method will be called before running main-loop

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.ComponentBasedApplication.OnFinished
member.summary: This method will be called after exiting main-loop

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.ComponentBasedApplication.OnRun
member.summary: This method will be called to start main-loop

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Common.ComponentBasedApplication.OnExit
member.summary: This method will be called to exit main-loop

member.summary: Overrides this method if you want to handle the behavior when the component is stopped.
